content: Uhm,let’s see. Did Hillary and Bill line their pockets using the clinton foundation as a front?We have to assume that somehow obama got a cut.What about J.Kerry and his Iranian contacts through his son in law.How about j.biden and his Ukraine double dealings with poroshenko.It is ALL out there, anyone with an index finger can be aware of all the crap that goes on.”In God We Trust” still is what matters.
